art.author: barbara_from_port_mcnicoll
art.post: I have just read the book as well. Years ago I had an NDE and knew such peace. We are given hints about life after death. All we need is faith that we will end up in heaven as well. I have no living memory of my grandparents and would love to see them for the first time. We also had a baby–Lynne who died one day after birth. I ache to hold her in my arms..
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
